pr_title: add xml object representation of replication configuration

timeline.message: add xml object representation of replication configuration
add xml object representation of replication configuration

timeline.bodyText: is this test really serving the purpose as it will always be skipped without remote target set up on MinIO server? Other than that, PR looks good to me.
timeline.author: poornas

replies.bodyText: Yes. It is needed. That's how I tested the implementation. Do you think any better way to do in automated tests?
replies.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: the MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_ROLE is validated on MinIO server while setting the replication configuration - since java SDK does not implement the admin API to get the arn while setting up remote targets, I do not see how this test will get executed
replies.author: poornas

replies.bodyText:
You would need to run these functional tests by exporting
$ export MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_SRC_BUCKET=<SRC-BUCKET>
$ export MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_ROLE=<REPLICATON-ROLE>
$ export MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_BUCKET_ARN=<REPLICATION-BUCKET-ARN>
$`./gradlew runFunctionalTest -Pendpoint=ENDPOINT -PaccessKey=ACCESSKEY -PsecretKey=SECRETKEY -Pregion=REGION`
Here you would need to have source/destination buckets and replication role created before running the test.
replies.author: balamurugana

replies.bodyText: my comment was wr.t mint tests.
replies.author: poornas
